applications.name: Endless WAV
applications.author: Björn Bojahr
applications.short_description: Software to create sustain loops in WAV files (8, 16 and 24 bit) with loop mix, auto loop, realtime crossfade, fade and cut functions.

applications.name: EXS2SFZ
applications.author: Björn Bojahr
applications.short_description: Imports sample mapping information from EXS24 instruments and generates SFZ files from it.
